long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
‚ÄùMelodikrysset" is a Swedish radio show, it's a crossword-puzzle with music-oriented questions. Use this extension to get an even better experience while playing Melodikrysset!

It only works on https://se.korsord.se/html5/

This extension adds dark mode support for the crossword-puzzle.

The extension also adds the option to highlight words in the crossword-puzzle. The shortcuts for this is:

Shift+A: Adds highlight to selected word
Shift+D: Deletes highlight from selected word
